name: BCP_lp_param
brief: LP process parameters for BCP Branch-Cut-Price

algorithms.name:
LP Parameters: Cut/Branch/Pricing Configuration

BCP_lp_par defines all configurable parameters for LP processes.
Set via parameter file: BCP_{param_name} {value}

**Character (boolean) parameters:**
- BranchOnCuts: Enable branching on slack cuts
- CompareNew{Cuts,Vars}ToOldOnes: Duplicate detection
- DoReducedCostFixing*: Variable fixing strategies
- SendFathomedNodeDesc: Return fathomed nodes to TM
- LpVerb_*: Verbosity flags for LP events

**Integer parameters:**
- SlackCutDiscardingStrategy: When to purge slack cuts
- CutEffectiveCountBeforePool: Iterations before pooling cut
- CutPoolCheckFrequency: How often to query cut pool
- IneffectiveConstraints: Definition of ineffective rows
- MaxCutsAddedPerIteration: Limit on cuts per round
- MaxPresolveIter: Strong branching iteration limit
- StrongBranchNum: Candidates for strong branching
- BranchingObjectComparison: Branch selection rule

**Double parameters:**
- Granularity: Objective discretization
- IntegerTolerance: Integer feasibility tolerance
- *Timeout: Waiting times for cuts/vars
- MaxRunTime: Time limit
